data.message: Coca-Cola its time to do more now! Start leading the way.  Your bottles  are dumped everywhere, its disgusting. Time to think about deposit schems. and using more recycled materials in your bottles, min of 75%

replies.message: Hi Artur, thanks for getting in touch. We have a new long-term target to see that all of our packaging is recovered so that none ends up where it shouldn’t. The first step is to double the amount of recycled plastic in our bottles to 50% by 2020. We’ll also launch our biggest ever ad campaign to inspire more of our consumers to recycle and champion new ways to improve packaging recovery.  For more info, please visit: http://spr.ly/61858qqtW
